item.title: Implementing iPhone's slider unlock with input type='range'
item.description: (check out the live demo) Introduction After reading “What the Heck is Shadow DOM?” I was inspired to see how far I could style the <input type="range"> element. Pretty far, as it turns out! My goal was to change the input’s default appearance: To the visual appearance of the iPhone’s unlock slider: As far as I can tell, only WebKit-based browsers and Opera have implemented input type=range. Mobile Safari hasn’t yet implemented it as of iOS 4.
